reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Reinforcing of organic fertilizer production and cooperative functioning

description.narrative: Siemenpuu has previously funded two projects of the COMUMOR cooperative that were related to the establishment and maintenance of organic cocoa cultivations. The main purpose of the current project is to produce 500 tons of fertilizer produced with organic methods, which is the annual required amount for the fertilization needs of the cooperative’s existing 110 cocoa plots. Produced fertilizers are also offered to non-member farmers, as the cooperative aims to promote organic farming and soil conservation together with seeking some income. Affordable organic fertilizers are needed to replace chemical fertilizers prevalent in Nicaragua. The project includes constructing the infrastructure needed for organic fertilizer production as well as building the basi c facilities, and it employs 10 young people and women for the making of the fertilizer. The direct beneficiaries of the project (in the form of income and obtained fertilizers) include dozens of small farmer families that are members of the cooperation, a nd the local community. The cooperative wants to lead the way and opens its doors to visitors who are interested in getting to know the organic fertilizer production process. COMUCOR is a small farmer cooperative founded in 2008 by fifty members. The coope rative produces cocoa on just over a hundred plots (one plot being sized about 0.7 hectares) in methods based on agroforestry and organic cultivation. The production of hand-made chocolates has also been initiated. Through its activities the cooperative ai ms to promote organic farming and soil and water protection, and to improve the farmers' economic standing e.g. by providing them with know-how of cocoa cultivation. The cooperative is working to continuously expand its infrastructure and to that way enabl e more extensive and organized functions, such as organic fertilizer production.
